description: A charity event for a special person
body:
In the third **DIY** art and music event from the South Manchester-based collective you are all invited once more into our home for an interactive experience and community gathering.



The [Picture House](https://www.bbc.co.uk) with Come Together Collective is a moving image exhibition and screening event featuring an eclectic range of work from local artists.



The Picture House with Come Together Collective is a moving image exhibition and screening event featuring an eclectic range of work from local artists. In the third DIY art and music event from the South Manchester-based collective you are all invited once more into our home for an interactive experience and community gathering.
